name: Dodge'n Dodge (Deluxe Edition)
description:
This is the Deluxe Edition (upgraded) of Dodge'n Dodge, my very first game.  

Dodge'N Dodge is a little game, where you have to control a rocket and dodge obstacles to survive !

(You can found the same game on itch by Travelly Studio, it's my old account.)

The development of this game (Orignial version) was finished 2 years ago.

Don't hesitate to give your best score in the comments, my personal best score is 967, good luck !
